publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1214# Bill Butler: Stamping Out Racism in Football-That the Parliament condemns all racist incidents in and around football at every level; welcomes the work of "Show Racism the Red Card" in spreading the message amongst players and fans that racial discrimination within the game must be stamped out, and considers that the 42 Scottish Premier League and Football League clubs should sign up to the UEFA Ten Point Plan which sets out a framework for action to challenge racism in football. Supported by: Tricia Marwick*, Paul Martin*, Linda Fabiani*, Alex Neil*, Mr Mark Ruskell*, Christine May*, Sarah Boyack*, Maureen Macmillan*, Marlyn Glen*, Jackie Baillie*, Dr Elaine Murray*, Des McNulty*, Michael McMahon*, Stewart Stevenson*, Ms Sandra White*, Mike Watson*, Robin Harper*, Rosie Kane*, Carolyn Leckie*, Tommy Sheridan*, Margaret Jamieson*

S2M-1214# Stamping Out Racism in Football (lodged on 27 April 2004) Mike Pringle*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Chris Ballance*, Cathie Craigie*, John Swinburne*, Scott Barrie*, Rob Gibson*, Shona Robison*, Eleanor Scott*, Dr Jean Turner*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Karen Gillon*, Roseanna Cunningham*
S2M-1214# Stamping Out Racism in Football (lodged on 27 April 2004) Trish Godman*, Frances Curran*, Shiona Baird*, Cathy Peattie*

S2M-1214# Bill Butler: Stamping Out Racism in Football-That the Parliament condemns all racist incidents in and around football at every level; welcomes the work of "Show Racism the Red Card" in spreading the message amongst players and fans that racial discrimination within the game must be stamped out, and considers that the 42 Scottish Premier League and Football League clubs should sign up to the UEFA Ten Point Plan which sets out a framework for action to challenge racism in football. Supported by: Tricia Marwick, Paul Martin, Linda Fabiani, Alex Neil, Mr Mark Ruskell, Christine May, Sarah Boyack, Maureen Macmillan, Marlyn Glen, Jackie Baillie, Dr Elaine Murray, Des McNulty, Michael McMahon, Stewart Stevenson, Ms Sandra White, Mike Watson, Robin Harper, Rosie Kane, Carolyn Leckie, Tommy Sheridan, Margaret Jamieson, Mike Pringle, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Chris Ballance, Cathie Craigie, John Swinburne, Scott Barrie, Rob Gibson, Shona Robison, Eleanor Scott, Dr Jean Turner, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Karen Gillon, Roseanna Cunningham, Trish Godman, Frances Curran, Shiona Baird, Cathy Peattie
S2M-1214# Stamping Out Racism in Football (lodged on 27 April 2004) Colin Fox*, Murray Tosh*
S2M-1214# Stamping Out Racism in Football (lodged on 27 April 2004) Mr Jamie Stone*
S2M-1214# Stamping Out Racism in Football (lodged on 27 April 2004) Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Donald Gorrie*
S2M-1214# Stamping Out Racism in Football (lodged on 27 April 2004) Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Robert Brown*
S2M-1214# Stamping Out Racism in Football (lodged on 27 April 2004) Michael Matheson*, Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-1214# Stamping Out Racism in Football (lodged on 27 April 2004) Rhona Brankin*

S2M-1214# Bill Butler: Stamping Out Racism in Football-That the Parliament condemns all racist incidents in and around football at every level; welcomes the work of "Show Racism the Red Card" in spreading the message amongst players and fans that racial discrimination within the game must be stamped out, and considers that the 42 Scottish Premier League and Football League clubs should sign up to the UEFA Ten Point Plan which sets out a framework for action to challenge racism in football. Supported by: Tricia Marwick, Paul Martin, Linda Fabiani, Alex Neil, Mr Mark Ruskell, Christine May, Sarah Boyack, Maureen Macmillan, Marlyn Glen, Jackie Baillie, Dr Elaine Murray, Des McNulty, Michael McMahon, Stewart Stevenson, Ms Sandra White, Mike Watson, Robin Harper, Rosie Kane, Carolyn Leckie, Tommy Sheridan, Margaret Jamieson, Mike Pringle, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Chris Ballance, Cathie Craigie, John Swinburne, Scott Barrie, Rob Gibson, Shona Robison, Eleanor Scott, Dr Jean Turner, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Karen Gillon, Roseanna Cunningham, Trish Godman, Frances Curran, Shiona Baird, Cathy Peattie, Colin Fox, Murray Tosh, Mr Jamie Stone, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Donald Gorrie, Mr Kenneth Macintosh, Robert Brown, Michael Matheson, Mr Adam Ingram, Rhona Brankin, Susan Deacon*
S2M-1214# Stamping Out Racism in Football (lodged on 27 April 2004) Helen Eadie*
